alert.note: Alert for White Mountains of Graham and Greenlee Counties including Hannagan Meadow (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued December 30 at 2:19AM MST until January 01 at 11:00AM MST by NWS Tucson
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH NOW IN EFFECT FROM FRIDAY MORNING THROUGH SATURDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Heavy wet snow possible. Total snow accumulations of 12 to 24 inches are possible above 7000 ft. Winds could gust as high as 40 mph Friday and Friday night. * WHERE...White Mountains of Graham and Greenlee Counties. * WHEN...From early Friday morning through Saturday morning. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions and significantly reduced visibility in any blowing snow. Bursts of heavy snow may make travel very difficult at best.
info.instruction: A Winter Storm Watch means there is potential for significant snow accumulations that may seriously impact travel. Gusty winds and blowing snow is also possible. Those planning travel into the watch area should prepare for difficult winter driving conditions.

area.areaDesc: White Mountains of Graham and Greenlee Counties including Hannagan Meadow
